name: Roboholic
description:
Roboholic is a roguelite FPS with wacky physics and even wackier abilities. An ex-farmer turned robot is resurrected over and over again in order to defeat a crazed warlord leading an army of genetically modified soldiers and malfunctioning droids.

  • Choose from an arsenal of weapons, modify your cyborg body with experimental tech and improvise your way through levels with destructible environments.
  • Exploit enemy weak points in the most effective or entertaining manner.
  • Traverse across different environments and randomly generated arenas that require rethinking your strategy.
